ovdesc.p: This is the template which gets updated with errors for system wide/integrity check COB jobs.

desc.p: Stores the reference to the BATCH record that contains jobs.
No input field and can have a maximum of 60 characters
Reference to the job name. Jobs form the part of a process in the BATCH record. Jobs have a frequency and carries specific attributes.
No input field and can have a maximum of 40 characters
States the reason for the error.
No input field and can have a maximum of 40 characters
Actual value during upload. No input field and can have a maximum of 40 characters.
This fields hold the product code of the application and the type contingent or non.contingent
Updated with bank's current working date.The date is in YYYYMMDD format.

Holds the EB.JOURNAL.SUMMARY id. This field is a component of the associated multi-value set (REASON – ACTUAL). The EXPECTED field should always hold ‘0’. The actual will be fetched from the EB.JOURNAL.SUMMARY record.
No input field and can have a maximum of 40 characters
Stores the RECORD ID during the upload.
Multi value field and can have a maximum of 75 characters
The Test id can have a maximum of 35 alpha - numeric characters.
